channel.title: OpenFoundry - Recently Added Listings - 網路應用

item.title: Evolution
item.description: Evolution is a free software licensed under the terms of the GNU General Public License. It is the official personal information manager and workgroup information management tool for GNOME since version 2.8 in Septemeber 2004. It combines many functions: email, calendar, address book, and task list management. Users can use it easily because its user interface is similiar to Microsoft Outlook.
item.author: rockhung
